attributes.action: Set fuel duty at a fixed amount rather than a percentage
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If fuel goes up, the fuel duty also rises. The duty on fuel should be set at a limit, (pence per litre) and NOT a percentage. The governments revenue from fuel duty has increased from £0.39 / litre to nearly £0.70 / litre since 1995, mainly from increases in oil prices. The government should decide how much is reasonable duty per litre and fix it there.
